ValidationRule.description: Checks if Viable is equal to Yes before moving the stage to Submitted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Research_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Project Scoping"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Viable__c, "Yes")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity should be viable in order to progress to next stage.
